biotools.summary: RatMine integrates many types of data for Rattus Norvegicus, Homo Sapiens, Mus Musculus and other organisms. You can run flexible queries, export results and analyse lists of data. The Rat Genome Database (RGD) was established in 1999 and is the premier site for genetic, genomic, phenotype, and disease data generated from rat research. In addition, it provides easy access to corresponding human and mouse data for cross-species comparisons. RGD's comprehensive data and innovative software tools make it a valuable resource for researchers worldwide.
